column1: I have now completed my D.Phil thesis entitled 'Modelling the water cycle on Mars' and am currently doing a short post-doc in the department. I graduated from University College London in 1998 and then worked at JET Joint Undertaking for a year before coming to Oxford. My supervisors are Dr. P. Read and Dr. S. Lewis.
Here are one or two links to find out more about what I do:
